summary.span: 定义访问 算法的加密服务提供程序 (CSP) 版本的包装对象。

span.span: Defines a wrapper object to access the cryptographic service provider (CSP) version of the algorithm.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此算法支持从128位到192位的密钥长度（以64位为增量）。This algorithm supports key lengths from 128 bits to 192 bits in increments of 64 bits. > [!NOTE] > 可用 (AES) 高级加密标准较新的对称加密算法。A newer symmetric encryption algorithm, Advanced Encryption Standard (AES), is available. 请考虑使用 类，而不是 类。Consider using the class instead of the class. 仅用于与旧版应用程序和数据兼容。Use only for compatibility with legacy applications and data. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 对象，并使用它对文件中的数据进行加密和解密。The following code example creates a object and uses it to encrypt and decrypt data in a file. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.3DESCSP.CreateEncryptor.File#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.3DESCSP.CreateEncryptor.File/CPP/fileexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.3DESCSP.CreateEncryptor.File#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.3DESCSP.CreateEncryptor.File/CS/fileexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.3DESCSP.CreateEncryptor.File#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.3DESCSP.CreateEncryptor.File/VB/fileexample.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例创建一个 对象，并使用它对内存中的数据进行加密和解密。The following code example creates a object and uses it to encrypt and decrypt data in memory. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.3DESCSP.CreateEncryptor.Memory#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.3DESCSP.CreateEncryptor.Memory/CPP/memoryexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.3DESCSP.CreateEncryptor.Memory#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.3DESCSP.CreateEncryptor.Memory/CS/memoryexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.3DESCSP.CreateEncryptor.Memory#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.3DESCSP.CreateEncryptor.Memory/VB/memoryexample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置加密操作的块大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the block size, in bits, of the cryptographic operation.
The block size, in bits.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 块大小是一项操作中可加密或解密的基本数据单位。The block size is the basic unit of data that can be encrypted or decrypted in one operation. 超过块大小的消息将作为连续块处理;小于块大小的消息必须用额外的位填充，以达到块大小。Messages longer than the block size are handled as successive blocks; messages shorter than the block size must be padded with extra bits to reach the size of a block. 有效的块大小取决于使用的对称算法。Valid block sizes are determined by the symmetric algorithm used.

span.span: Before you call , check the length of the initialization vector and throw an exception if it is too long.

summary.span: 生成用于该算法的随机 。

span.span: Generates a random to be used for the algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未指定，则使用此方法生成随机密钥。Use this method to generate a random key when none is specified. 此方法从不返回弱密钥 (参阅 ) 。This method will never return a weak key (see ). 此算法支持从128位到192位的密钥长度（以64位为增量）。This algorithm supports key lengths from 128 bits to 192 bits in increments of 64 bits.

span.span: Cryptographic Services

MemberSignature.Value: public override byte[] IV { get; set; }
.property instance unsigned int8[] IV
Public Overrides Property IV As Byte()
public: virtual property cli::array <System::Byte> ^ IV { cli::array <System::Byte> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ value); };
member this.IV : byte[] with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置对称算法的初始化向量 ()。

span.span: Gets or sets the initialization vector () for the symmetric algorithm.
The initialization vector.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 你创建一个类的新实例 或手动调用方法时，属性将自动设置为新的随机值 。The property is automatically set to a new random value whenever you create a new instance of one of the classes or when you manually call the method. 属性的大小 必须与 属性除以8相同。The size of the property must be the same as the property divided by 8. 派生自类的类 使用称为加密块链的链接模式 (CBC) ，这需要密钥和初始化向量来对数据执行加密转换。The classes that derive from the class use a chaining mode called cipher block chaining (CBC), which requires a key and an initialization vector to perform cryptographic transformations on data. 若要对使用某个类加密的数据进行解密 ，必须将 属性和属性设置 为用于加密的相同值。To decrypt data that was encrypted using one of the classes, you must set the property and property to the same values that were used for encryption. 对于给定的密钥 *k*，不使用初始化向量的简单块密码会将相同的纯文本输入块加密为相同的密码文本输出块。For a given secret key *k*, a simple block cipher that does not use an initialization vector will encrypt the same input block of plain text into the same output block of cipher text. 如果纯文本流中存在重复的块，则密码文本流中会有重复的块。If you have duplicate blocks within your plain text stream, you will have duplicate blocks within your cipher text stream. 如果未经授权的用户知道你的纯文本块的结构，他们可以使用该信息破译已知的密码文本块，并可能恢复你的密钥。If unauthorized users know anything about the structure of a block of your plain text, they can use that information to decipher the known cipher text block and possibly recover your key. 若要对付此问题，请将上一块中的信息混合到对下一个块进行加密的过程中。To combat this problem, information from the previous block is mixed into the process of encrypting the next block. 因此，两个相同的纯文本块的输出是不同的。Thus, the output of two identical plain text blocks is different. 由于此方法使用前面的块对下一个块进行加密，因此需要使用初始化向量来加密第一个数据块。Because this technique uses the previous block to encrypt the next block, an initialization vector is needed to encrypt the first block of data.

exception.span: 试图将初始化向量设置为 。

span.span: An attempt was made to set the initialization vector to .

exception.span: 试图将初始化向量设置为无效大小。

span.span: An attempt was made to set the initialization vector to an invalid size.

summary.span: 获取或设置密钥的大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bits, of the secret key.

value.span: 密钥的大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: The size, in bits, of the key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 密钥的最小大小为128位，最大大小为256位。The minimum size of the key is 128 bits, and the maximum size is 256 bits. 更改 `KeySize` 值会重置密钥并生成新的随机密钥。Changing the `KeySize` value resets the key and generates a new random key. 只要调用属性 setter，就会发生这种情况 `KeySize` (包括为其分配相同的值) 。This happens whenever the `KeySize` property setter is invoked (including when it's assigned the same value).

member this.Padding : System.Security.Cryptography.PaddingMode with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置对称算法中使用的填充模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the padding mode used in the symmetric algorithm.

value.span: 对称算法中使用的填充模式。

span.span: The padding mode used in the symmetric algorithm.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大多数纯文本消息不包含完全填充块的多个字节。Most plain text messages do not consist of a number of bytes that completely fill blocks. 通常，没有足够的字节来填充最后一个块。Often, there are not enough bytes to fill the last block. 发生这种情况时，会将填充字符串添加到文本中。When this happens, a padding string is added to the text. 例如，如果块长度为64位，而最后一个块只包含40位，则会添加24位填充。For example, if the block length is 64 bits and the last block contains only 40 bits, 24 bits of padding are added. 有关特定模式的说明，请参阅枚举。See the enumeration for a description of specific modes.

exception.span: 该填充模式不是 值之一。

span.span: The padding mode is not one of the values.
